turn.2: Pfeffikon  Pfeffikon is a former municipality in the district of Sursee in the canton of Lucerne in Switzerland.
turn.3: When was it made a city?
turn.4: On 1 January 2013 the former municipality of Pfeffikon merged into the municipality of Rickenbach.
